name: Jumping Square (NikolaTesla13)
description:
This is a game made from scratch in C++ and OpenGL with no game engine for the Extra Credits Game Jam 2020.

You are a square. The enemies are squares. The world is made of squares. Awesome graphics, right?  Avoid the enemies by jumping. (tip: you can move left-right). Keep the distance between you and enemies!

Control using: W - up,  A - left, D - right.
